title: I'm Really Pissed Off...
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! I have a severe dislike when games decide for no reason to go fully online and add DRM for no real reason. Payday 3 is a game I was incredibly hyped for but to see it fall into the trap of live-service content for no real reason is just sad to see. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!

Check out the newest podcast episode: https://youtu.be/Xl2Mi1zPhRw
